description: This table contains the other provider roles associated with the hospital account CPT(R)/HCPCS codes list in the Hospital Accounts Receivable (HAR) master file.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: CPT_OTHER_PROV_RL_C_NAME
columns.description:
Roles of the other providers associated with the CPTï¿½ / HCPCS procedure.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
